EN: Make sure this is injected into a Unity game.

column7: 功能：场景层级、对象检查器、组件分析

zh-CN: F5 - 刷新场景（Unity探索器中）

TEXT_KEY: A powerful runtime inspection and debugging tool for Unity games.
EN: A powerful runtime inspection and debugging tool for Unity games.
zh-CN: 强大的Unity游戏运行时检查和调试工具。

TEXT_KEY: Built with Dear ImGui and UnityResolve for seamless integration with Unity's runtime environment.
EN: Built with Dear ImGui and UnityResolve for seamless integration with Unity's runtime environment.
zh-CN: 使用Dear ImGui和UnityResolve构建，与Unity运行时环境无缝集成。
游戏对象和组件检查器

TEXT_KEY: Mouse Click - Select objects in hierarchy
EN: Mouse Click - Select objects in hierarchy
zh-CN: 鼠标点击 - 在层级中选择对象
双击 - 展开/折叠树节点

TEXT_KEY: Right Click - Context menu for objects
EN: Right Click - Context menu for objects
zh-CN: 右击 - 对象上下文菜单
点击标题 - 展开/折叠组件
悬停(?) - 显示帮助提示

TEXT_KEY: Search box - Filter objects by name
EN: Search box - Filter objects by name
zh-CN: 搜索框 - 按名称过滤对象
鼠标滚轮 - 滚动列表
Ctrl+鼠标滚轮 - 放大/缩小
Tab - 在输入字段间导航

column5: 语言系统初始化失败，使用备用文本
